info.title: AttestationClient
info.description: Describes the interface for the per-tenant enclave service.

get.summary: Retrieves the OpenID Configuration data for the Azure Attestation Service
get.description: Retrieves metadata about the attestation signing keys in use by the  attestation service

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.summary: Retrieves the OpenID Configuration data for the Azure Attestation Service
get.description: Retrieves attestation signing keys in use by the attestation service

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.summary: Retrieves the current policy for a given kind of TEE.

parameters.name: tee
parameters.description: Specifies the trusted execution environment to be used to validate the evidence

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

put.summary: Sets the policy for a given kind of TEE.

parameters.name: tee
parameters.description: Specifies the trusted execution environment to be used to validate the evidence

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

post.summary: Resets the attestation policy for the specified tenant and reverts to the default policy.

parameters.name: tee
parameters.description: Specifies the trusted execution environment to be used to validate the evidence

requestBody.description: JSON Web Signature with an empty policy document

200.description: Success - Returns a JWT signed by the metadata signing key that contains the hash of the supplied policy to be set.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

post.summary: Accepts a new policy document and returns a JWT which expresses  used in preparation to set attestation policy.

parameters.name: tee
parameters.description: Specifies the trusted execution environment to be used to validate the evidence

requestBody.description: JSON Web Signature (See RFC7515) expressing the new policy

200.description: Success - Returns a JWT signed by the metadata signing key that contains the hash of the supplied policy to be set.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for displaying in a user interface.

TeeKind.name: tee
TeeKind.description: Specifies the trusted execution environment to be used to validate the evidence
